Feature.Name: Calculator feature
Feature.Description:
In order to perform calculations correctly As a office assistant I want to use calculator for my calculations
This example presents usage of MultiAssertAttribute.

Scenario.Name: Adding numbers

THEN adding "2" to "3" should give "5"
AND adding "-3" to "2" should give "-1"

Scenario.Name: Multiplying numbers

Step.Name: GIVEN a calculator
THEN multiplying "6" by "2" should give "12"
AND multiplying "-1" by "2" should give "-2"

Feature.Name: Contacts management
Feature.Description: In order to maintain my contact book As an application user I want to add, browse and remove my contacts

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to add multiple contacts

Name.Format: Contact book should allow me to add multiple contacts

Step.Name: GIVEN my contact book is empty
WHEN I add new contacts
THEN all contacts should be available in the contact book

StepName.Format: all contacts should be available in the contact book

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove all contacts

Name.Format: Contact book should allow me to remove all contacts

Step.Name: GIVEN my contact book is filled with many contacts

StepName.Format: my contact book is filled with many contacts

Step.Name: WHEN I clear it
Step.StatusDetails: Step 2: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

Step.Name: THEN the contact book should be empty

StepName.Format: the contact book should be empty

Scenario.StatusDetails: Step 2: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove contacts

Name.Format: Contact book should allow me to remove contacts

Step.Name: GIVEN my contact book is filled with contacts

StepName.Format: my contact book is filled with contacts

Step.Name: WHEN I remove one contact
THEN the contact book should not contain removed contact any more

StepName.Format: the contact book should not contain removed contact any more

Step.Name: AND the contact book should contains all other contacts

StepName.Format: the contact book should contains all other contacts

Example usage of fluent scenarios
